description: Visual guidelines for different webtoon genres

romance.camera: Eye-level for intimacy, slight low-angle for vulnerability
romance.lighting: warm ambient, soft glow, golden hour, intimate atmosphere, soft diffused natural light
romance.props: Coffee cups, phones with messages, tissues, meaningful objects, flowers
romance.atmosphere: ethereal, dreamy, soft bokeh, light-filled, gentle, pastel-tinted
romance.color_palette: warm peachy tones, soft blues and lavenders, creamy neutrals

drama.shot_preferences: Medium close-ups (40-45% character), emotional focus shots
drama.camera: Eye-level, occasional low-angle for vulnerability moments
drama.lighting: dramatic but natural, contrast for emotional beats, rim lighting
drama.props: Personal items, letters, photos, meaningful objects that tell story
drama.color_palette: muted tones with emotional accents, natural colors

thriller.shot_preferences: Wide shots (25-30% character), Dutch angles, high angles for paranoia
thriller.composition: Characters 25-35%, environment dominates and tells story
thriller.camera: Off-kilter angles, overhead for vulnerability, low-angle for threat
thriller.lighting: harsh shadows, dim lighting, single light source, ominous glow
thriller.props: Hidden details, suspicious background elements, foreshadowing objects
thriller.atmosphere: tense, ominous, foreboding, isolating, unsettling, dark
thriller.color_palette: desaturated, cold blue tones, muted with dark accents

comedy.shot_preferences: Medium full shots (body language), reaction close-ups
comedy.composition: Characters 35-40%, room for visual gags in environment
comedy.camera: Slight exaggeration in angles, reaction-focused framing
comedy.lighting: bright clear lighting, vibrant, energetic, even illumination
comedy.props: Comedy props (spilled items, tangled objects, mishap aftermath)

slice_of_life.shot_preferences: Wide establishing shots (20-30% character), medium shots
slice_of_life.composition: Characters 20-35%, world and environment is the story
slice_of_life.camera: Observational, pulled back, natural everyday angles
slice_of_life.lighting: natural daylight, realistic ambient, ordinary comfortable
slice_of_life.props: Everyday items (grocery bags, transit cards, textbooks, meals)
slice_of_life.atmosphere: calm, peaceful, mundane beauty, contemplative, cozy
slice_of_life.color_palette: natural realistic colors, warm everyday tones

fantasy.shot_preferences: Mix of wide (show magical world) and dramatic close-ups
fantasy.composition: Balanced 30-40% character, space for magical effects
fantasy.lighting: magical glow, ethereal light, mystical illumination, enchanted
fantasy.props: Fantasy elements, glowing objects, supernatural manifestations
fantasy.color_palette: jewel tones, ethereal pastels, magical highlights

action.shot_preferences: Dynamic wide shots, impact close-ups, speed lines
action.composition: Characters 30-40%, space for movement and effects
action.camera: Low angles for power, dynamic tilts, motion blur
action.lighting: high contrast, dramatic shadows, impact lighting
action.props: Action effects, debris, speed lines, impact markers

horror.shot_preferences: Extreme close-ups for fear, wide shots for isolation
horror.camera: Canted angles, POV shots, lurking perspectives
horror.lighting: deep shadows, single harsh light, flickering, silhouettes
horror.props: Unsettling details, shadows, partially visible threats
horror.color_palette: desaturated, sickly greens, deep reds, black
